name: jaak-stamps
summary: AI-powered document capture library for iOS using computer vision
description:
JAAKStamps is an advanced document capture library that provides:
- Real-time document detection using ONNX Runtime
- Multi-step capture process (front/back documents)
- Document classification (ID cards, passports, driver's licenses)
- Alignment guidance with visual feedback
- Auto-capture when document is properly aligned
- Multiple camera support with automatic selection
- Performance monitoring and debug mode
- Comprehensive error handling with recovery
